root.name: Steel Storm: Burning Retribution
root.description: OverviewOriginally the game was supposed to be released in episodes. The developer, Kot-in-Action Creative Artel, has now released the first two episodes as one game: Steel Storm: Burning Retribution. The game is available directly from the developer or through Steam.
